definition: to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The control of supercritical airfoil boundary layer separation is adapted using micro-vortex generators.
sentences.chinese: 超臨界翼型附面層分離控制適合採用微型渦流發生器。

sentences.english: Comparison of the Velocity and the temperature profiles in B.
sentences.chinese: 測量了兩種情況下的附面層速度分佈和溫度分佈。
